title: LeBron James Can Do Anything On A Basketball Court, Like Taking A Selfie With Young Fans
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Teen - Today 
On an NBA court, LeBron James has been crowned as an MVP and a champion, but he's never been known as a selfie artist. That changed on Wedne...
